description: A hwIplpmGlobalLossRatioExceed trap is sent when the global loss ratio
exceeds the uppper threshold in continuous five test intervals.

event.Summary: Global loss ratio $v2 exceeded upper threshold

description: The object indicates the number of loss packets for global loss measure.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmGlobalLossPkts

description: The object indicates the ratio of loss packets for global loss measure.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmGlobalLossRatio

description: The object identifies the latest period number of global loss.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmGlobalLatestPeriodNo

description: A hwIplpmGlobalLossRatioRecovery trap is sent when the global loss ratio
is under the lower threshold in continuous five test intervals.

event.Summary: Global loss ratio $v2 threshold alarm cleared

description: The object indicates the number of loss packets for global loss measure.

description: The object identifies the latest period number of global loss.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmGlobalLatestPeriodNo

description: A hwIplpmLinkForwardLossRatioExceed trap is sent when the link forward loss ratio
exceeds the uppper threshold in continuous five test intervals.

event.Summary: Link forward loss ratio $v2 exceeded upper threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmLinkForwardLossRatioExceed HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmLinkForwardLossPkts C 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmLinkForwardLossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmPortQosQ0LossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmPortQosQ1LossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmPortQosQ2LossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmPortQosQ3LossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmPortQosQ4LossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmPortQosQ5LossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmPortQosQ6LossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmPortQosQ7LossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmPortUserQueLossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmPortOutputLossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPLPM-MIB::hwIplpmLinkLatestPeriodNo C 9999
